statements: SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE accessibility = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, biodiversity_data FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE coordinates LIKE '%,%' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, biodiversity_data FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE biodiversity_data ->> 'type' = 'rainforest';
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE accessibility = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, biodiversity_data FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, biodiversity_data FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE biodiversity_data ->> 'animals' = 'tigers';
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE coordinates LIKE '%21.45%' AND biodiversity_data ->> 'birds' = 'parrots';
SELECT location_name, accessibility FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE biodiversity_data ->> 'plants' = 'orchids' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations;
SELECT location_id, coordinates, accessibility FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE biodiversity_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location_id, coordinates, accessibility FROM ecotourism_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitor_logs WHERE visit_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitor_logs ORDER BY visit_date ASC, visitor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id, accessibility FROM ecotourism_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(visitor_name) AS visitor_count FROM visitor_logs GROUP BY location_id HAVING visitor_count > 5;
SELECT location_id, visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitor_logs WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT location_id, visitor_name, visit_duration FROM visitor_logs WHERE visitor_name LIKE 'J%' AND visit_duration >= INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM ecotourism_locations;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE accessibility = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, biodiversity_data FROM ecotourism_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, rating FROM ecotourism_locations JOIN location_reviews ON ecotourism_locations.location_id = location_reviews.location_id;
SELECT u.username, l.location_name, lr.rating FROM users u JOIN location_reviews lr ON u.user_id = lr.user_id JOIN ecotourism_locations l ON lr.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Forest%' ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE biodiversity_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, accessibility FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE biodiversity_data ->> 'endangered_species' = 'Yes' ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_reviews JOIN users ON location_reviews.user_id = users.user_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY location_reviews.review_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, coordinates, accessibility FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations;
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE accessibility = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, biodiversity_data FROM ecotourism_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trail_name, length FROM trails WHERE difficulty = 'Difficult' ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE accessibility = true;
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM ecotourism_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT visitor_name, age, email FROM visitors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE type = 'Cabin' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT trail_name, length FROM trails WHERE difficulty = 'Medium' AND length > 5 ORDER BY length ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE accessible = true;
SELECT id, name, description FROM attractions WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT location_id, activity_type, duration FROM activities WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT name FROM locations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM attractions WHERE name LIKE 'Z%' OR description LIKE '%adventure%';
SELECT location_id, species_name, population FROM biodiversity WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY population DESC, species_name ASC;
SELECT id, activity_type, duration FROM activities WHERE location_id = 3 AND duration < 120 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Hotel' AND price < 200 ORDER BY price ASC;
